projects.name: Portfolio site
projects.description: The site that you are on right now. It is made with React. The server is a simple Node and Express application. The project entries such as this one are pulled from a JSON file and rendered on the page. I like databases, but for this use case, a database would be overkill.

projects.name: Activity Knot
projects.description: This is an application that my mob and I made for a 9 day jam when we were training at </salt>, from idea to planning to execution. Its concept is to help people with the same interests meet up and practice them in person. We got the idea after a mob member wanted to play basketball during a weekend, but couldn't find anywhere or any one to play. It is made with the SERN stack: SQL, Express, React, and Node. Sessions are handled with the Express session library. The passwords of users are hashed using Argon2.
